column4: Noob needs help? I installed v5.10 of Ubunto and everything worked great I tried to upgrade to 6.06 LTS and now gnome wont start up, gives me a no screens found error, I've checked around on the net and found several pages but none that helped.
phew! i thought it was something i did. :)
As long as you do not fry your harddrive you always have a second chance :P
